Name: Lord G's Early-Stage Sale
Desc: A mysterious guy named Lord G proposes to the committee that the Commercial Square should offer a short-term 50% off discount on everything to enhance customer retention.

Desc: A mysterious guy named Lord G proposes to the committee that the Commercial Square should offer a short-term 50% off discount on everything to enhance customer retention.

Name: Lord G's Final-Stage Sale
Desc: A mysterious guy named Lord G proposes to the committee that the Commercial Square should offer a short-term 50% off discount on everything to enhance customer retention.

Name: Friendly Service Day
Desc: We always maintain a no-service-fee policy, but small, voluntary tips from customers who appreciate our service are not included.

Name: Kuroro Coffee Collaboration
Desc: Launch the limited-time Kuroro Coffee collaboration event. Visit designated stores to get a limited-edition Kuroro Coffee cup set.

Name: Babylonia Universal Consignment
Desc: Babylonia Universal Cinema wants to consign some movie merchandise at the Commercial Square. They are willing to pay a promotion fee if the sales go well.

Name: Commercial Square Celebration
Desc: The Commercial Square's grand opening celebration has begun. Achieve the revenue KPIs during this period to receive substantial rewards from the BCC.
